name: Cat legend
description:
Meow, meow, meow? Meow, meow, meow?! Meow meow meow!!!



Cat Legend is a vampire like game with fantasy style and meat pigeon elements, and our production team is very obsessed with this game format!



Dear Hakimi, improve yourself by killing monsters, gradually become stronger, defeat bosses, and usher in Hakimi's tomorrow! We all have a bright future





Choose different cat offspring for battle




Build your own special bd




Find a small surprise hidden in the map area





It's here, defeat it!
